description:
Hi
openstack Icehouse with Xen4 on Cent OS6.5.
Toolstack:Libvirt

We have installed one controller with compute1  + compute2.

While creating instance it failed with error "  Instance failed to spawn"

Please find attached logs of nova compute and Scheduler. 

Nova.conf

rpc_backend = qpid
qpid_hostname = 192.168.1.6
my_ip = 192.168.1.6
vncserver_listen = 192.168.1.6
vncserver_proxyclient_address = 192.168.1.6
vnc_enabled=True
libvirt_ovs_bridge=br-int
libvirt_vif_type=ethernet
libvirt_use_virtio_for_bridges=True
libvirt_vif_driver=nova.virt.libvirt.vif.LibvirtGenericVIFDriver
rpc_backend = qpid
qpid_hostname = 192.168.1.6
my_ip = 192.168.1.6
vncserver_listen = 192.168.1.6
vncserver_proxyclient_address = 192.168.1.6
vnc_enabled=True
libvirt_ovs_bridge=br-int
libvirt_vif_type=ethernet
libvirt_use_virtio_for_bridges=True
libvirt_vif_driver=nova.virt.libvirt.vif.LibvirtGenericVIFDriver
instance_usage_audit=True
instance_usage_audit_period=hour
notification_driver=nova.openstack.common.notifier.rpc_notifier
compute_driver = libvirt.LibvirtDriver
instance_usage_audit=True
instance_usage_audit_period=hour
notification_driver=nova.openstack.common.notifier.rpc_notifier
compute_driver = libvirt.LibvirtDriver

Nova Scheduler log:

2014-07-14 18:47:58.261 4152 WARNING nova.scheduler.filters.compute_filter [req-7c3ad960-9b93-4d4e-a43e-090d5c08d6ba 818ef8e8816b426b95d3708bc7949fc1 ea31329396294185bfba564a02cc50d0] (compute1, compute1) ram:29607 disk:21504 io_ops:1 instances:2 has not been heard from in a while
2014-07-14 18:48:01.614 4152 ERROR nova.scheduler.filter_scheduler [req-7c3ad960-9b93-4d4e-a43e-090d5c08d6ba 818ef8e8816b426b95d3708bc7949fc1 ea31329396294185bfba564a02cc50d0] [instance: dade5a94-0d65-4bcb-a60d-27fd334b5b77] Error from last host: controller (node controller): [u'Traceback (most recent call last):\n', u'  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/nova/compute/manager.py", line 1305, in _build_instance\n    set_access_ip=set_access_ip)\n', u'  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/nova/compute/manager.py", line 393, in decorated_function\n    return function(self, context, *args, **kwargs)\n', u'  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/nova/compute/manager.py", line 1717, in _spawn\n    LOG.exception(_(\'Instance failed to spawn\'), instance=instance)\n', u'  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/nova/openstack/common/excutils.py", line 68, in __exit__\n    six.reraise(self.type_, self.value, self.tb)\n', u'  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/nova/compute/manager.py", line 1714, in _spawn\n    block_device_info)\n', u'  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/nova/virt/libvirt/driver.py", line 2265, in spawn\n    block_device_info)\n', u'  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/nova/virt/libvirt/driver.py", line 3656, in _create_domain_and_network\n    power_on=power_on)\n', u'  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/nova/virt/libvirt/driver.py", line 3559, in _create_domain\n    domain.XMLDesc(0))\n', u'  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/nova/openstack/common/excutils.py", line 68, in __exit__\n    six.reraise(self.type_, self.value, self.tb)\n', u'  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/nova/virt/libvirt/driver.py", line 3554, in _create_domain\n    domain.createWithFlags(launch_flags)\n', u'  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/eventlet/tpool.py", line 179, in doit\n    result = proxy_call(self._autowrap, f, *args, **kwargs)\n', u'  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/eventlet/tpool.py", line 139, in proxy_call\n    rv = execute(f,*args,**kwargs)\n', u'  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/eventlet/tpool.py", line 77, in tworker\n    rv = meth(*args,**kwargs)\n', u'  File "/usr/lib64/python2.6/site-packages/libvirt.py", line 708, in createWithFlags\n    if ret == -1: raise libvirtError (\'virDomainCreateWithFlags() failed\', dom=self)\n', u'libvirtError: POST operation failed: xend_post: error from xen daemon: (xend.err "(\'create\', \'-aqcow2:/var/lib/nova/instances/dade5a94-0d65-4bcb-a60d-27fd334b5b77/disk\') failed (512  )")\n']
2014-07-14 18:48:01.617 4152 WARNING nova.scheduler.filters.compute_filter [req-7c3ad960-9b93-4d4e-a43e-090d5c08d6ba 818ef8e8816b426b95d3708bc7949fc1 ea31329396294185bfba564a02cc50d0] (compute1, compute1) ram:29607 disk:21504 io_ops:1 instances:2 has not been heard from in a while
2014-07-14 18:48:01.617 4152 WARNING nova.scheduler.driver [req-7c3ad960-9b93-4d4e-a43e-090d5c08d6ba 818ef8e8816b426b95d3708bc7949fc1 ea31329396294185bfba564a02cc50d0] [instance: dade5a94-0d65-4bcb-a60d-27fd334b5b77] Setting instance to ERROR state.


nova Compute log:

2014-07-14 18:47:58.803 4088 INFO oslo.messaging._drivers.impl_qpid [-] Connected to AMQP server on 192.168.1.6:5672
2014-07-14 18:48:00.939 4088 ERROR nova.virt.libvirt.driver [req-7c3ad960-9b93-4d4e-a43e-090d5c08d6ba 818ef8e8816b426b95d3708bc7949fc1 ea31329396294185bfba564a02cc50d0] An error occurred while trying to launch a defined domain with xml: <domain type='xen'>
  <name>instance-0000000a</name>
  <uuid>dade5a94-0d65-4bcb-a60d-27fd334b5b77</uuid>
  <memory unit='KiB'>2097152</memory>
  <currentMemory unit='KiB'>2097152</currentMemory>
  <vcpu placement='static'>1</vcpu>
  <bootloader></bootloader>
  <os>
    <type>linux</type>
  </os>
  <clock offset='utc' adjustment='reset'/>
  <on_poweroff>destroy</on_poweroff>
  <on_reboot>restart</on_reboot>
  <on_crash>destroy</on_crash>
  <devices>
    <emulator>/usr/lib/xen/bin/qemu-dm</emulator>
    <disk type='file' device='disk'>
      <driver name='tap2' type='qcow2'/>
      <source file='/var/lib/nova/instances/dade5a94-0d65-4bcb-a60d-27fd334b5b77/disk'/>
      <target dev='sda' bus='scsi'/>
    </disk>
    <console type='pty'>
      <target type='xen' port='0'/>
    </console>
    <input type='mouse' bus='xen'/>
    <graphics type='vnc' port='-1' autoport='yes' listen='192.168.1.6' keymap='en-us'>
      <listen type='address' address='192.168.1.6'/>
    </graphics>

2014-07-14 18:48:00.940 4088 TRACE nova.compute.manager [instance: dade5a94-0d65-4bcb-a60d-27fd334b5b77]     domain.XMLDesc(0))
2014-07-14 18:48:00.940 4088 TRACE nova.compute.manager [instance: dade5a94-0d65-4bcb-a60d-27fd334b5b77]   File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/nova/openstack/common/excutils.py", line 68, in __exit__
2014-07-14 18:48:00.940 4088 TRACE nova.compute.manager [instance: dade5a94-0d65-4bcb-a60d-27fd334b5b77]     six.reraise(self.type_, self.value, self.tb)
2014-07-14 18:48:00.940 4088 TRACE nova.compute.manager [instance: dade5a94-0d65-4bcb-a60d-27fd334b5b77]   File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/nova/virt/libvirt/driver.py", line 3554, in _create_domain
2014-07-14 18:48:00.940 4088 TRACE nova.compute.manager [instance: dade5a94-0d65-4bcb-a60d-27fd334b5b77]     domain.createWithFlags(launch_flags)
2014-07-14 18:48:00.940 4088 TRACE nova.compute.manager [instance: dade5a94-0d65-4bcb-a60d-27fd334b5b77]   File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/eventlet/tpool.py", line 179, in doit
2014-07-14 18:48:00.940 4088 TRACE nova.compute.manager [instance: dade5a94-0d65-4bcb-a60d-27fd334b5b77]     result = proxy_call(self._autowrap, f, *args, **kwargs)
2014-07-14 18:48:00.940 4088 TRACE nova.compute.manager [instance: dade5a94-0d65-4bcb-a60d-27fd334b5b77]   File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/eventlet/tpool.py", line 139, in proxy_call

2014-07
title: Windows 7 64bit instance failed to create in openstack Icehouse with libvirt xen

comments.content:
Hi
openstack Icehouse with Xen4 on Cent OS6.5.
Toolstack:Libvirt

We have installed one controller with compute1  + compute2.

While creating instance it failed with error "  Instance failed to spawn"

Please find attached logs of nova compute and Scheduler. 

Nova.conf

rpc_backend = qpid
qpid_hostname = 192.168.1.6
my_ip = 192.168.1.6
vncserver_listen = 192.168.1.6
vncserver_proxyclient_address = 192.168.1.6
vnc_enabled=True
libvirt_ovs_bridge=br-int
libvirt_vif_type=ethernet
libvirt_use_virtio_for_bridges=True
libvirt_vif_driver=nova.virt.libvirt.vif.LibvirtGenericVIFDriver
rpc_backend = qpid
qpid_hostname = 192.168.1.6
my_ip = 192.168.1.6
vncserver_listen = 192.168.1.6
vncserver_proxyclient_address = 192.168.1.6
vnc_enabled=True
libvirt_ovs_bridge=br-int
libvirt_vif_type=ethernet
libvirt_use_virtio_for_bridges=True
libvirt_vif_driver=nova.virt.libvirt.vif.LibvirtGenericVIFDriver
instance_usage_audit=True
instance_usage_audit_period=hour
notification_driver=nova.openstack.common.notifier.rpc_notifier
compute_driver = libvirt.LibvirtDriver
instance_usage_audit=True
instance_usage_audit_period=hour
notification_driver=nova.openstack.common.notifier.rpc_notifier
compute_driver = libvirt.LibvirtDriver

Nova Scheduler log:

2014-07-14 18:47:58.261 4152 WARNING nova.scheduler.filters.compute_filter [req-7c3ad960-9b93-4d4e-a43e-090d5c08d6ba 818ef8e8816b426b95d3708bc7949fc1 ea31329396294185bfba564a02cc50d0] (compute1, compute1) ram:29607 disk:21504 io_ops:1 instances:2 has not been heard from in a while
2014-07-14 18:48:01.614 4152 ERROR nova.scheduler.filter_scheduler [req-7c3ad960-9b93-4d4e-a43e-090d5c08d6ba 818ef8e8816b426b95d3708bc7949fc1 ea31329396294185bfba564a02cc50d0] [instance: dade5a94-0d65-4bcb-a60d-27fd334b5b77] Error from last host: controller (node controller): [u'Traceback (most recent call last):\n', u'  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/nova/compute/manager.py", line 1305, in _build_instance\n    set_access_ip=set_access_ip)\n', u'  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/nova/compute/manager.py", line 393, in decorated_function\n    return function(self, context, *args, **kwargs)\n', u'  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/nova/compute/manager.py", line 1717, in _spawn\n    LOG.exception(_(\'Instance failed to spawn\'), instance=instance)\n', u'  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/nova/openstack/common/excutils.py", line 68, in __exit__\n    six.reraise(self.type_, self.value, self.tb)\n', u'  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/nova/compute/manager.py", line 1714, in _spawn\n    block_device_info)\n', u'  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/nova/virt/libvirt/driver.py", line 2265, in spawn\n    block_device_info)\n', u'  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/nova/virt/libvirt/driver.py", line 3656, in _create_domain_and_network\n    power_on=power_on)\n', u'  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/nova/virt/libvirt/driver.py", line 3559, in _create_domain\n    domain.XMLDesc(0))\n', u'  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/nova/openstack/common/excutils.py", line 68, in __exit__\n    six.reraise(self.type_, self.value, self.tb)\n', u'  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/nova/virt/libvirt/driver.py", line 3554, in _create_domain\n    domain.createWithFlags(launch_flags)\n', u'  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/eventlet/tpool.py", line 179, in doit\n    result = proxy_call(self._autowrap, f, *args, **kwargs)\n', u'  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/eventlet/tpool.py", line 139, in proxy_call\n    rv = execute(f,*args,**kwargs)\n', u'  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/eventlet/tpool.py", line 77, in tworker\n    rv = meth(*args,**kwargs)\n', u'  File "/usr/lib64/python2.6/site-packages/libvirt.py", line 708, in createWithFlags\n    if ret == -1: raise libvirtError (\'virDomainCreateWithFlags() failed\', dom=self)\n', u'libvirtError: POST operation failed: xend_post: error from xen daemon: (xend.err "(\'create\', \'-aqcow2:/var/lib/nova/instances/dade5a94-0d65-4bcb-a60d-27fd334b5b77/disk\') failed (512  )")\n']
2014-07-14 18:48:01.617 4152 WARNING nova.scheduler.filters.compute_filter [req-7c3ad960-9b93-4d4e-a43e-090d5c08d6ba 818ef8e8816b426b95d3708bc7949fc1 ea31329396294185bfba564a02cc50d0] (compute1, compute1) ram:29607 disk:21504 io_ops:1 instances:2 has not been heard from in a while
2014-07-14 18:48:01.617 4152 WARNING nova.scheduler.driver [req-7c3ad960-9b93-4d4e-a43e-090d5c08d6ba 818ef8e8816b426b95d3708bc7949fc1 ea31329396294185bfba564a02cc50d0] [instance: dade5a94-0d65-4bcb-a60d-27fd334b5b77] Setting instance to ERROR state.


nova Compute log:

2014-07-14 18:48:00.939 4088 ERROR nova.virt.libvirt.driver [req-7c3ad960-9b93-4d4e-a43e-090d5c08d6ba 818ef8e8816b426b95d3708bc7949fc1 ea31329396294185bfba564a02cc50d0] An error occurred while trying to launch a defined domain with xml: <domain type='xen'>
  <name>instance-0000000a</name>
  <uuid>dade5a94-0d65-4bcb-a60d-27fd334b5b77</uuid>
  <memory unit='KiB'>2097152</memory>
  <currentMemory unit='KiB'>2097152</currentMemory>
  <vcpu placement='static'>1</vcpu>
  <bootloader></bootloader>
  <os>
    <type>linux</type>
  </os>
  <clock offset='utc' adjustment='reset'/>
  <on_poweroff>destroy</on_poweroff>
  <on_reboot>restart</on_reboot>
  <on_crash>destroy</on_crash>
  <devices>
    <emulator>/usr/lib/xen/bin/qemu-dm</emulator>
    <disk type='file' device='disk'>
      <driver name='tap2' type='qcow2'/>
      <source file='/var/lib/nova/instances/dade5a94-0d65-4bcb-a60d-27fd334b5b77/disk'/>
      <target dev='sda' bus='scsi'/>
    </disk>
    <console type='pty'>
      <target type='xen' port='0'/>
    </console>
    <input type='mouse' bus='xen'/>
    <graphics type='vnc' port='-1' autoport='yes' listen='192.168.1.6' keymap='en-us'>
      <listen type='address' address='192.168.1.6'/>
    </graphics>

2014-07-14 18:48:00.940 4088 TRACE nova.compute.manager [instance: dade5a94-0d65-4bcb-a60d-27fd334b5b77]     domain.XMLDesc(0))
2014-07-14 18:48:00.940 4088 TRACE nova.compute.manager [instance: dade5a94-0d65-4bcb-a60d-27fd334b5b77]   File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/nova/openstack/common/excutils.py", line 68, in __exit__
2014-07-14 18:48:00.940 4088 TRACE nova.compute.manager [instance: dade5a94-0d65-4bcb-a60d-27fd334b5b77]     six.reraise(self.type_, self.value, self.tb)
2014-07-14 18:48:00.940 4088 TRACE nova.compute.manager [instance: dade5a94-0d65-4bcb-a60d-27fd334b5b77]   File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/nova/virt/libvirt/driver.py", line 3554, in _create_domain

2014-07-14 18:48:00.940 4088 TRACE nova.compute.manager [instance: dade5a94-0d65-4bcb-a60d-27fd334b5b77]   File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/eventlet/tpool.py", line 179, in doit
2014-07-14 18:48:00.940 4088 TRACE nova.compute.manager [instance: dade5a94-0d65-4bcb-a60d-27fd334b5b77]     result = proxy_call(self._autowrap, f, *args, **kwargs)
2014-07-14 18:48:00.940 4088 TRACE nova.compute.manager [instance: dade5a94-0d65-4bcb-a60d-27fd334b5b77]   File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/eventlet/tpool.py", line 139, in proxy_call

comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~test-jose8585

comments.content:
Please can anyone help us to fix the issue we are trying to create win7 instance using nova command.

We are getting error while spawning
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~test-jose8585

comments.content: This is using the libvirt driver, not the xenapi driver (which is what's used by xenserver) - fixed tags
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~bob-ball

comments.content: we are facing issue with Xen and KVM
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~test-jose8585

comments.content: Can you please confirm that whether Openstack Icehouse supports Xen+Libvirt API in 64bit OS.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~test-jose8585

comments.content: libvirt xen is largely untested, it is considered a class C supported hypervisor.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~sdague
